overview: Marc Dorcel has built a reputation for creating the finest adult entertainment the world has to offer. Countless awards and accolades; exotic European newcomers, and French phenom Laure Sainclair. It's time to see what's left the rest of world breathless and begging for more.
tagline: Mysterious mansions, masked orgies, and one big secret...Laure Sinclair in a game of hide and peek!
title: Masquerade
